data.name: Professional Scouts
data.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -55% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar. Deer slowly decay while being carried.

variations.name: Professional Scouts
variations.description:
Scouts gain the ability to carry animal carcasses and +100% damage against wild animals.
Scouts move -55% slower while carrying and cannot pick up Boar. Deer slowly decay while being carried.
variations.descriptionCN:
侦察兵获得携带动物尸骸的能力，且对野生动物造成的伤害 +100%。
侦察兵在携带动物尸骸时移动速度 -55%，且无法拾取野猪尸骸。若携带的是鹿尸骸，则会缓慢腐烂。
